item.title: Video Editor Needed For TikTok and Reels - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced video editor for our luxury e-commerce site celebrating an established and globally recognized artist.

Successful candidates will have a strong portfolio of Instagram and TikTok videos featuring motion graphics, and a modern video editing style that gets views and engagement. Products include apparel, accessories, home goods, and gifts. Experience with luxury brands, fashion and home goods a plus.

Only responses that include a portfolio link will be considered. Please include in your response.

Please also confirm how many short-form videos you can provide at $500 a month for a three-month contract. You will be provided with all products to shoot and keep.

Only responses from creators based in the US will be considered (Sorry no exceptions and no agencies).



Budget: $500
Posted On: June 18, 2024 16:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:TikTok Video, Instagram Reels, Digital Video, Animation, Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Video Commercial, UGC
Skills: TikTok Video, Instagram Reels, Digital Video, Animation, Video Editing, Videography, Video Production, Video Commercial, UGC
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: VideoEditing Short-Form Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, there

I'm looking to hire 6 editors from anywhere of the world with or without previous business experience to help me edit short-form content videos for social media

The video must have:

Background Music
Subtitles
SFX
Animations (masks or ...
Color Grading
And export it with the proper settings to be posted in Facebook, Instagram, TikTok & Youtube Shorts

You will have to edit between 24 to 28 short-form videos per week

Initially, you will be paid $600/mo

And after 6 months you will be eligible for a raise

Going from $600/mo to $1000/mo

Programs you must know how to use: After Effects, DaVinci Resolve & Premiere Pro. (CapCut is acceptable if you proof you can edit good videos with it)

The videos are more like a "Talkative Normal" style so the animations work more as "Extra B-Roll"

The payment will be send via Stripe

If you are interested in working with me, just send me a message to schedule a Zoom Call to talk about it

In case you don't get qualified in the first 6 vacants available, I would like to have your information anyways. In that way I can contact you when I required another 6 editors.

My Best Regards,
Carlos Nino
Founder & Chairman of The Founders Agency

Budget: $600
Posted On: June 18, 2024 16:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Color Grading, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Color Grading, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Edit a 6 minutes video of an app's demo - Upwork
item.description:
I made a 6 minutes video where I run a demo of an app that we created for a client. I think there are parts where I stutter or that I lose the track so I would like you to check the video, remove those parts and add German subtitles.

The deliverable is the video edited. We don't need to add fancy things, just retouch it with your video editor magic.

I will share the videos to the chosen candidate

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 18, 2024 15:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Germany

item.title: Content Specialist Virtual Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
We are hiring a Content Specialist - Virtual Assistant

-Full-time only.
-Home-Based/Remote.
-Must be willing to work during nighttime.
-Must be willing to take a free prerequisite course before you are hired. (approximately 8-14 hours).
-Learn individually through our courses and guides.
-Learn through your team members.
-No minimum internet speed required.
-30-day paid provisional period.
-All tasks and productive work are billable.
-All training in the first 30 days is billable.

--

We will hire a Content Specialist Virtual Assistant. The Content Specialist VA will perform tasks found in the attached Content Factory Guide.

If you don't have every skill, that's okay—we will train you.
The tasks include but are not limited to:

- Upload Pillar Content (Long-form Video) To Google Drive
- Transcribe Pillar Content (Long-form Video)
- Take Out Timestamps And Blog Post Ideas
- Write An Article About Pillar Content (Long-form Video)
- Create A Webpage For Pillar Content (Long-form Video)
- Post An Article on WordPress
- Write Copy For Cross Posting
- Post An Article On A Facebook Page
- Tweet An Article On A Twitter Page
- Post An Article On A LinkedIn Page
- Score Authority
- Upload A RAW Video On A YouTube Channel
- Identify Timestamps Of A Pillar Content (Long-form Video) For Snippets
- Upload A Video On A Facebook Page
- Tweet A Video On A Twitter Page
- Post A Video On A LinkedIn Page
- Post A Short-Form Video To A Web Page
- Boost Pillar Content (Long-form Video) On Facebook
- Collect Positive Mentions

The beauty of this job is that you can live anywhere on the planet, have a steady income for years, and continue to grow your capabilities.

We’ll need someone who has great English communication skills and has experience in writing blogs and articles; someone with the ability to intelligently summarize/sensationalize a news article and make our client sound smart, amazing, and positioned as an expert on a variety of topics.

Aside from all of that, there may be a need for you to make podcast summaries and other general VA work. This won’t be a mere content writing position but a position that will only start as a content Specialist and give you the chance to grow in different fields.

So you must be okay with not everything being perfectly clear-- that often you have to use your best judgment and figure stuff out. There is a balance between asking questions all the time (needing handholding) and struggling to try to it without ever asking for help (lone ranger wasting time).

Prove to us that hiring you would be a match in Heaven! Share us examples of your best work: articles, podcast summaries or any content that you’ve written!

===================================

To apply for this job, tell us why you're a long-term player in your response and make a one-minute video demonstrating why you would be a good fit for us and why you are a long-term player. It can be up to 4 minutes if you'd like. Paste that URL in your message. Do not read a script but do prepare thoughts. Write the keyword "BEAVER" in the subject line of your reply.

We expect that you, like the others in our program, will level up and continue to increase their salary over time. As you're more productive, you deserve to earn more.

Looking forward to hearing from you and how you fit this description!
Please also complete this skills assessment with your replies by number.
For Example: 1 – C, 2 - A
This quiz evaluates your understanding of our blog posting guidelines, focusing on repurposing video content into engaging articles.

Each question offers multiple-choice options to test your ability to follow our processes and adhere to best practices.

The quiz consists of 25 questions. The estimated time to finish the quiz is 15 to 20 minutes, although it is not time-restricted. To pass the test, you must answer 80% of the questions correctly.

This assessment ensures you are prepared to produce high-quality content that meets our standards. Good luck!


1. What does the second stage in the Content Factory, "Process," focus on?

a) Creating entirely new content from scratch.
b) Repurposing existing videos, podcasts and social posts into articles, ebooks, courses, and guides.
c) Only editing video content for quality.
d) Conducting research for new content topics.

2. Why is it important to understand the Goals, Content, and Targeting (GCT) before creating the article?

a) To add personal opinions.
b) To ensure the article aligns with the intended purpose and audience.
c) To speed up the writing process.
d) To increase word count.

3. What should you consider when adding internal links to your article?

a) Use the same link multiple times.
b) Ensure links are relevant and support the main topic.
c) Link to general top-level domains frequently.
d) Link to any page regardless of relevance.

4. Why is it important for links to make the content fit together like a tree?

a) To create a random assortment of articles.
b) To build a structured network where smaller topics branch out from main ones, enhancing overall coherence and SEO.
c) To increase word count.
d) To avoid using too many links.

5. What is the best practice for using anchor text in your hyperlinks?

a) Use "Click Here!" for all links.
b) Use text that accurately describes the link’s content.
c) Anchor text is not required. Add naked links instead.
d) Use broad terms like "digital" or "video."

6. What is not true for AI-generated content?

a) Long, complex sentences.
b) Phrases like "the digital landscape," "beacon of," or "delve into."
c) Repetition of the same phrases and ideas multiple times.
d) Writing in an active voice and using simple, direct language.

7. What is the final step before submitting your article?

a) Submitting without review.
b) Proofreading for grammar, spelling, and clarity using tools like Grammarly and ChatGPT.
c) Adding more content.
d) Ignoring errors.

8. Why is it essential to watch the video before transcribing?

a) To understand the content and get the Goals, Content, and Targeting right.
b) To estimate the length of the article.
c) To see if the video is entertaining.
d) To avoid transcription.

9. How can you ensure your article has a logical flow?

a) By randomly organizing the content.
b) By making sure all your sentences and paragraphs make sense together.
c) By ignoring the structure.
d) By adding unrelated content.


10. What should you consider when choosing an engaging title for your article?

• A) The title should be long and detailed
• B) The title should summarize the content and attract readers
• C) The title should include multiple keywords
• D) The title should be vague and general

11. Why is it recommended to write in an active voice?

a) It makes sentences longer.
b) It makes the writing clearer and more engaging.
c) It sounds more professional.
d) It’s easier to write.

12. What type of images should you include in your article, and how should they be uploaded?

a) Stock images from Google.
b) Screenshots or relevant images with captions and alt text, uploaded through the media library.
c) Any image found online.
d) Images without captions.

13. How should you structure headings within your article?

a) Use H1 for all headings.
b) Use H2 for subheadings, ensuring they are clear and concise.
c) Avoid using any headings.
d) Use new headings for every few lines of text.

14. What tools should you use to proofread your article?

a) Grammarly and ChatGPT.
b) Microsoft Word's spell checker.
c) Read it once and submit.
d) None of the above.

15. What are the final steps before publishing your article on WordPress?

a) Categorize, keyword-tag, and apply SEO plugins.
b) Publish without any additional steps.
c) Only add keywords.
d) Ignore SEO and categories.

16. After publishing an article featuring a client, what should you do next?

a) Wait for the client to find the article.
b) Email and DM the client with a link to the article, then post in the Facebook group.
c) Do nothing.
d) Only post in the Facebook group.

17. How can you avoid creating duplicate content when repurposing videos?

a) Ignore existing content.
b) Always check if a similar article already exists and enhance it if needed.
c) Create new articles for every video without checking.
d) Use the same content for multiple articles.

18. Why is it important to add source context or videos in the article?

a) To increase word count.
b) To provide a reference and prevent confusion.
c) To add personal opinions.
d) To fill space.

19. What should you do after transcribing the video to ensure accuracy?

a) Post the raw transcription immediately.
b) Review and correct any errors manually.
c) Ignore any errors.
d) Use the transcription without any review.

20. Which SEO plugins do we use in WordPress?

a) Yoast SEO and MonsterInsights.
b) RankMath and LinkWhisper.
c) All in One SEO and WP Rocket.
d) Jetpack and Akismet.

21. How do RankMath and LinkWhisper improve your article?

a) By making it look better.
b) By providing actionable SEO improvements and suggesting internal links.
c) By adding more keywords.
d) By increasing the word count.

22. What is the #1 mistake VAs often make when repurposing video content?

a) Adding too many personal insights.
b) Mindlessly using AI tools like ChatGPT without understanding the video.
c) Spending too much time on proofreading.
d) Not using enough SEO techniques.

23. How can you ensure your writing is clear and concise?

a) Use long and complex sentences.
b) Write in short, straightforward sentences and avoid unnecessary words.
c) Add filler content.
d) Use elaborate vocabulary.

24. What is the purpose of categorizing and tagging your post in WordPress?

a) To make the post look longer
b) To organize content and improve searchability
c) To add more keywords randomly
d) To fill in required fields

25. What should you avoid when writing a conclusion for your article?

a) Summarizing key points.
b) Introducing new and unrelated topics.
c) Encouraging reader feedback.
d) Including a call to action.


Hourly Range: $3.00-$3.25
Posted On: June 18, 2024 15:53 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:A+ Content, Content Writing, Virtual Assistance
Skills: A+ Content, Content Writing, Virtual Assistance
Country: United States
click to apply

b) Review and correct any errors manually.
c) Ignore any errors.
d) Use the transcription without any review.

20. Which SEO plugins do we use in WordPress?

a) Yoast SEO and MonsterInsights.
b) RankMath and LinkWhisper.
c) All in One SEO and WP Rocket.
d) Jetpack and Akismet.

21. How do RankMath and LinkWhisper improve your article?

a) By making it look better.
b) By providing actionable SEO improvements and suggesting internal links.
c) By adding more keywords.
d) By increasing the word count.

22. What is the #1 mistake VAs often make when repurposing video content?

a) Adding too many personal insights.
b) Mindlessly using AI tools like ChatGPT without understanding the video.
c) Spending too much time on proofreading.
d) Not using enough SEO techniques.

23. How can you ensure your writing is clear and concise?

a) Use long and complex sentences.
b) Write in short, straightforward sentences and avoid unnecessary words.
c) Add filler content.
d) Use elaborate vocabulary.

24. What is the purpose of categorizing and tagging your post in WordPress?

a) To make the post look longer
b) To organize content and improve searchability
c) To add more keywords randomly
d) To fill in required fields

25. What should you avoid when writing a conclusion for your article?

a) Summarizing key points.
b) Introducing new and unrelated topics.
c) Encouraging reader feedback.
d) Including a call to action.


Hourly Range: $3.00-$3.25
Posted On: June 18, 2024 15:53 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:A+ Content, Content Writing, Virtual Assistance
Skills: A+ Content, Content Writing, Virtual Assistance
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Performer to record a song for a streaming event (high quality video required) - Upwork
item.description:
Day Translations is seeking to hire a creative, responsible and skilled performer who can sing and record their performance for a streaming event. Their performance will be added to an awards ceremony we host via YoutTube every year.

Requirements:
- The duration of the video/song is between 3 and 4 minutes.
- The video needs to be recorded in horizontal 16:9 ratio and high quality.
- The performer MUST submit an edited video or a ready-to-use video.
- The performer can sing in any language - singing in a language different than English is encouraged.
- The song must be wholesome / must not contain any profanity.
- The song will be proposed by the performer and it will be then be pre-approved by our team, before recording.
- The song can be a cover or an original.
- The performer cannot release the video to the public or online before the date of the - streaming premiere (September 30th).

We are currently looking for 3-4 performers. Each performer will be hired for one video/song.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 18, 2024 15:41 UTC
Category: Singing
Skills:Video Production, Singing, Performance Art, Video Editing
Skills: Video Production, Singing, Performance Art, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create Voice-Over Video Project with Images & Video - Upwork
item.description:
Project will include sifting through thousands of photos to get just the right ones to use in the video project, adding animation and other interesting effects to the video, including some actual video of the subject with a voice over effect throughout, adding music as needed to enhance the quality, and post production options based on the customer needs.

Customer will provide the videos, voice over, and access to the asset photos to look through for the video.

Video will be 2-3 minutes in length max and the final output must be ultra high quality.

Option for additional videos including shorter versions and versions with different emphasis beyond this initial project for a successful upworker.

NOTE: Do not send stock submission text. This project will be a lot of work. Simply explain in a couple of sentence why you want to do the project and then send only 3 examples of specific work that you've done that may be similar in terms of the editing work.

Budget: $140

item.title: Long-Term YouTube Video Editor with experience in Premiere Pro and Capcut - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who specializes in using Adobe Premiere Pro to edit YouTube videos. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of video editing techniques, transitions, color grading, and audio mixing. The main responsibilities include syncing and organizing footage, cutting and arranging clips, adding text and graphics, enhancing visuals with effects, and ensuring a smooth and engaging final product. The editor should also have a good sense of storytelling and be able to work with the provided script or instructions. Attention to detail and the ability to deliver high-quality work within deadlines are essential.

Skills required:

- Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro
- Strong understanding of video editing techniques
- Ability to sync and organize footage
- Knowledge of transitions, color grading, and audio mixing
- Attention to detail and ability to follow instructions

item.title: IG reel / short form video creator - Upwork
item.description:
Project Overview:

We're seeking an experienced video editor with a proven track record of creating engaging and high-quality Instagram Reels.

The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for storytelling, excellent video editing skills, and the ability to work independently as a freelancer.

Our goal is to create visually appealing and entertaining content for our brand, similar to the style showcased by the following Instagram accounts:

https://www.instagram.com/vawzen/
https://www.instagram.com/valorgi/

Responsibilities:

-Edit/create high-quality Instagram Reels
-Conceptualize and develop creative ideas for each Reel, ensuring they align with our brand's tone and aesthetic
-Work closely with our team to understand the project requirements and deliverables
-Edit videos using industry-standard video editing software
-Add music, sound effects, and visual effects to enhance the overall viewing experience
-Ensure all edited Reels meet Instagram's recommended specs
-Meet tight deadlines and deliver high-quality work within a short turnaround time

Requirements:

-Experience in video editing, specifically for Instagram Reels
-Portfolio showcasing your work on Instagram or other social media platforms
-Excellent video editing skills with proficiency in industry-standard software
-Strong understanding of visual storytelling principles and attention to detail
-Fluency in English (written and verbal)
-Ability to work independently and manage your time effectively
-Familiarity with Instagram's content guidelines and best practices

If you are passionate about creating stunning Instagram Reels and have the skills and experience we are looking for, we'd love to hear from you. Please submit your portfolio or samples of your work.


Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 15:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Video Editing
Skills: Instagram Reels, Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Design your own ChatGPT! Participate in a Research Study - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking gig workers to take part in a study on how generative AI tools can be designed to help you work more efficiently and productively. As a participant, you will:

Attend a 2-hour virtual group interview/discussion with fellow gig workers and researchers via Zoom.

Optionally join a future 15-20 minute Slack discussion session (with bonus compensation).

To be eligible, you must:
-Be at least 18 years old.
-Have a minimum of 1 year of experience using any gig platform.
-Be proficient in speaking, writing, and understanding English.
-Have internet access and a computer capable of video conferencing.

Your insights are invaluable for developing AI tools tailored to gig workers' needs. If interested, please complete this form [link] and also apply on our Upwork job posting.

We appreciate your time and look forward to your participation in shaping the future of generative AI for the gig economy

https://forms.gle/rCfweEeoKeFUf1Rj9

Budget: $20

item.title: 🎬🇫🇷 Monteur Vidéo Français pour YouTube essentiellement (long format & short) 📹✨ - Upwork
item.description:
Nous recherchons un Monteur Vidéo talentueux pour monter des vidéos captivantes et informatives pour YouTube (et LinkedIn), ainsi que des vidéos au format shorts. Si vous avez une expérience avérée dans le montage vidéo et que vous êtes passionné par la création de contenu engageant, cette opportunité est faite pour vous !

#### Rôle et Responsabilités :
- Monter des vidéos pour YouTube essentiellement.
- Créer des vidéos au format shorts captivantes et agréables à regarder.
- Assurer la fluidité des vidéos en ajoutant des effets pour offrir la meilleure expérience possible.
- Collaborer avec l'équipe pour garantir la cohérence et la qualité des contenus.
- ⚠️ S'inspirer des styles de montage des vidéos suivantes :
  - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r3gYQ4Vf5XU
  - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IkmPjeNKkBQ
  - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gVTxEmXH4hc

#### Compétences et Expériences Requises :
- Expérience solide en montage vidéo.
- Capacité à éditer facilement des vidéos avec des outils professionnels (pas de Movie Maker)
- Créativité et souci du détail.
- Capacité à travailler de manière autonome et à respecter les délais.
- Savoir créer eet reconnaître une vidéo agréable et engageante d'une vidéo de basse qualité

### Pourquoi nous rejoindre :
- Possibilité de déboucher sur un travail à long terme.
- Équipe très structurée avec du contenu récurrent.
- Retours honnêtes et objectifs pour une amélioration continue.

Postulez maintenant pour nous rejoindre ! 🚀

  - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IkmPjeNKkBQ
  - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gVTxEmXH4hc

#### Compétences et Expériences Requises :
- Expérience solide en montage vidéo.
- Capacité à éditer facilement des vidéos avec des outils professionnels (pas de Movie Maker)
- Créativité et souci du détail.
- Capacité à travailler de manière autonome et à respecter les délais.
- Savoir créer eet reconnaître une vidéo agréable et engageante d'une vidéo de basse qualité

### Pourquoi nous rejoindre :
- Possibilité de déboucher sur un travail à long terme.
- Équipe très structurée avec du contenu récurrent.
- Retours honnêtes et objectifs pour une amélioration continue.

Postulez maintenant pour nous rejoindre ! 🚀
